dc:title: We Appeal to You in the Name of Saint Joseph
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Appeals for all to do or give a little knowing that God will do the rest. Says since we are all brothers we must be subject to every living creature to be like Him, serving rather than being served.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 648 1953-04-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
